dct_title_s: AUDIENCE DE GUADALAJARA, NOUVEAU MEXIQUE, CALIFORNIE, &c
dct_description_sm: [1656], in French, with imprint 'A Paris chez P. Mariette rue S. Iacques a l'Esperance Avec Pri. pour 20 ans'. Manuscript '63' (top right, outside map border).
1657, with changed imprint: Par N. Sanson d'Abbeville Geogr. ordin' du Roy. Avecq Privilege pour 20 Ans. 1657.
In French, with 'Par N. Sanson d'Abbeville Geogr Ordin du Roy' imprint. Otherwise identical with 1st and 2nd states. Undated
In Latin, [1657?], entitled: Audienca de Guadalajara, Nova Mexico California &c. / Per N. Sanson. California labelled California Insula. Title cartouche smaller, of scrollwork instead of wings.

In Dutch, 1665, 1683, 1705, 1715, entitled: 'T gebiedt van Guadalajara, Niew Mexico, en Californie enz. / door N. Sanson d'Abbeville Geogr Ordin du Roy. Mountains shown pictorially on mainland, place names unchanged from French editions, but with Nouvelle Albion labelled on California's north. Issued in his: L'Amerique en plusieurs cartes nouvelles et exactes, et en divers traittez de graphie & d'histoire... , Utrecht, following p.26,[1683]. Issued in: Algeemeene Weereld-Beschreibung ... / Pherotee De La Croix. -- Amsterdam : Francois Halma, 1705.

In French, with Guadalajara now spelled Guadalaiara in title cartouche, and 'Par N. Sanson d'Abb Geogr. Ordin du Roy' imprint. Otherwise identical with Dutch issue (state 5). Issued in: Atlas portatif, [Map]271 / du Sauzet. Issued in: America explored, [p.145] / Adrian Johnson
In German, entitled: Audience de Guadalajara, Nova Mexico California &c. / Per N. Sanson. Issued in: Die Gantze Erd-Kugel Bestehend In ... Europa, Asia, Africa, Und America, [1679].

In French, with mountains above Apache. Entitled: Audience de Guadalajara, Nouveau Mexique, Californie, &c. / Par N. Sanson d’Abbeville Geogr Ordin du Roy. Otherwise identical with Dutch issue (state 5). Issued in: Description de tout L’Universe… / Par Mrs. Sanson Pere & Fils. – A Amsterdam : Francois Halma, M.D.CC. (1700).

Wheat 54; Tooley 15; Leighly 28 (Plate IX); BN Sanson II A(5), Sanson II F(5) & Sanson VII E; Ashley Baynton-Williams, correspondence, 1995; UCB; Americana Catalog No. 54, Richard Fitch “Old maps & prints & books”, Item #30.
Par N. Sanson d'Abbeville Geogr. ordin' du Roy.
Reissued 1657, 1662, 1676, 1683, 1696, 1699.Issued in his: L'Amerique en plusieurs cartes nouvelles et exactes, et en divers traittez de graphie & d'histoire... , Paris, 1657.
California as an island, labelled California Isle, and with indented northern coastline and many place names. Agubela de Cato to north. Winged title cartouche. (upper right).
